product_name: Surftech Generator Coretech Stand Up Paddle Board - 11' 6"
long_description: Paddlers of all skill levels can enjoy the stability, maneuverability and affordability of this popular all-round paddle board. It's smooth and quick on flat water and can chew up the surf as well.
short_description: Paddlers of all skill levels can enjoy the stability, maneuverability and affordability of this popular all-round paddle board. It's smooth and quick on flat water and can chew up the surf as well.
